content: a court in rimini has issued a final ruling in a case involving the dissolution of community property between two parties the court has ordered the division of various real estate properties between the parties and assigned equal ownership they have also ordered one party to make a cash payment to the other party the court considered the indivisibility of the property and determined that it should be sold at auction if the parties do not request an allocation the court has also addressed the payment of costs and determined that they should be shared equally between the parties the ruling was made on february 22 2019 and filed in the clerks office on february 23 2019
